title: Several things Teemo is good for.
body:
"Dying".
"Being Deleted".
"Nothing".
"A Poro snack ingredient".
"Sejuani's Boar to trample over".
"Examples of how skills work - with rigorous retesting (only the damage based ones though)".
"Jayce's Thundering Blow".
"Darius's Noxian Guillotine".
"Vi's Excessive force".
"Sion's basic attacks".

Several things Teemo is not useful for:

"An Ally".
"Being picked".
"Being played".
"Existance in Runeterra".

Things I enjoy about Teemo:

"Seeing him get caught out of position in Stealth and die".
"Not seeing him picked".
"His laugh".

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3zurytpwGZk

replies.body: that video made me twitch like i was going mental.. if i heard that for 10mins i don't think i would be sane anymore
Never underestimate the power of the scouts code.
Temmo op. Wait for karthus to ult, wait 2.5 seconds, pop out from ur shrub and 1 hit him
